name: Dumpster Simulator 2
description:
The Sequel to the "send the dumpster into the sunset simulator" was created as part of a casual creative month challenge!

Navigate your dumpster through a series of challenging levels. Hit the magic pole at the end of the course to complete the level!  

Controls

  • W/S: Spin rear wheels
  • A/D: Turn Front Wheels
  • Space: Jump
  • B: Brakes
  • Left Mouse: Rear Brakes
  • Right Mouse: Front Brakes  
  • Left-Shift: Engage Turbo Mode!
  • ESC- Pause Menu / Reset
